View and manage all banned players in th: View and manage all banned players in this menu.
Open this submenu for player related sub: Open this submenu for player related subcategories.
Open this submenu for vehicle related su: Open this submenu for vehicle related subcategories.
Open this submenu for world related subc: Open this submenu for world related subcategories.
Miscellaneous vMenu options/settings can: Miscellaneous vMenu options/settings can be configured here. You can also save your settings in this menu.
Common player options can be accessed he: Common player options can be accessed here.
Choose a ped model, customize it and sav: Choose a ped model, customize it and save & load your customized characters.
Create, edit, save and load multiplayer: Create, edit, save and load multiplayer peds. ~r~Note, you can only save peds created in this submenu. vMenu can NOT detect peds created outside of this submenu. Simply due to GTA limitations.
Add/remove weapons, modify weapons and s: Add/remove weapons, modify weapons and set ammo options.
Mange, and spawn saved weapon loadouts.
Here you can change common vehicle optio: Here you can change common vehicle options, as well as tune & style your vehicle.
Spawn a vehicle by name or choose one fr: Spawn a vehicle by name or choose one from a specific category.
Save new vehicles, or spawn or delete al: Save new vehicles, or spawn or delete already saved vehicles.
Set a vehicle as your personal vehicle,: Set a vehicle as your personal vehicle, and control some things about that vehicle when you're not inside.
Change the time, and edit other time rel: Change the time, and edit other time related options.
Change all weather related options here.
Sends a private message to this player. ~r~Note: staff may be able to see all PM's.
Teleport into the vehicle of the player.
Spectate this player. Click this button: Spectate this player. Click this button again to stop spectating.
Enables or disables the GPS route on you: Enables or disables the GPS route on your radar to this player.
This will print the player's identifiers: This will print the player's identifiers to the client console (F8). And also save it to the CitizenFX.log file.
Kill this player, note they will receive: Kill this player, note they will receive a notification saying that you killed them. It will also be logged in the Staff Actions log.
Kick the player from the server.
Give this player a tempban of up to 30 d: Give this player a tempban of up to 30 days (max). You can specify duration and ban reason after clicking this button.
Ban this player permanently from the ser: Ban this player permanently from the server. Are you sure you want to do this? You can specify the ban reason after clicking this button.
Set the driving style that is used for t: Set the driving style that is used for the Drive to Waypoint and Drive Around Randomly functions.
Select a custom driving style. Make sure: Select a custom driving style. Make sure to also enable it by selecting the 'Custom' driving style in the driving styles list.
Make your player ped drive your vehicle: Make your player ped drive your vehicle to your waypoint.
Make your player ped drive your vehicle randomly around the map.
The player ped will find a suitable plac: The player ped will find a suitable place to stop the vehicle. The task will be stopped once the vehicle has reached the suitable stop location.
This will stop the driving task immediat: This will stop the driving task immediately without finding a suitable place to stop.
Makes you invisible to yourself and othe: Makes you invisible to yourself and others.
Allows you to run forever without slowin: Allows you to run forever without slowing down or taking damage.
Get ~g~Snail~s~ powers and run very fast: Get ~g~Snail~s~ powers and run very fast!
Get ~g~Snail 2.0~s~ powers and swim supe: Get ~g~Snail 2.0~s~ powers and swim super fast!
Get ~g~Snail 3.0~s~ powers and jump like: Get ~g~Snail 3.0~s~ powers and jump like a champ!
Disables player ragdoll, makes you not f: Disables player ragdoll, makes you not fall off your bike anymore.
Set your wanted level by selecting a val: Set your wanted level by selecting a value, and pressing enter.
When this is enabled, NPCs will not be a: When this is enabled, NPCs will not be able to drag you out of your vehicle if they get angry at you.
Set the armor level/type for your player: Set the armor level/type for your player.
Kill yourself by taking the pill. Or by: Kill yourself by taking the pill. Or by using a pistol if you have one.
Select a scenario and hit enter to start: Select a scenario and hit enter to start it. Selecting another scenario will override the current scenario. If you're already playing the selected scenario, selecting it again will stop the scenario.
This will force a playing scenario to st: This will force a playing scenario to stop immediately, without waiting for it to finish it's 'stopping' animation.
Makes the car invincible. Includes fire: Makes the car invincible. Includes fire damage, explosion damage, collision damage and more.
Disables your engine from taking any dam: Disables your engine from taking any damage.
This prevents scratches and other damage: This prevents scratches and other damage decals from being applied to your vehicle. It does not prevent (body) deformation damage.
Disables your wheels from being deformed: Disables your wheels from being deformed and causing reduced handling. This does not make tires bulletproof.
Disables vehicles such as the Ramp Buggy: Disables vehicles such as the Ramp Buggy from taking damage when using the ramp.
Automatically repairs your vehicle when: Automatically repairs your vehicle when it has ANY type of damage. It's recommended to keep this turned off to prevent glitchyness.
Open/close the extra door (#1). Note thi: Open/close the extra door (#1). Note this door is not present on most vehicles.
Open/close the extra door (#2). Note thi: Open/close the extra door (#2). Note this door is not present on most vehicles.
Open/close the bomb bay. Only available: Open/close the bomb bay. Only available on some planes.
Remove a specific vehicle door completel: Remove a specific vehicle door completely.
When enabled, doors that you remove usin: When enabled, doors that you remove using the list above will be deleted from the world. If disabled, then the doors will just fall on the ground.
This works on certain vehicles only, lik: This works on certain vehicles only, like the besra for example. It 'fades' certain paint layers.
NO, do NOT delete my vehicle and go back: NO, do NOT delete my vehicle and go back!
Yes I'm sure, delete my vehicle please,: Yes I'm sure, delete my vehicle please, I understand that this cannot be undone.
Enable or disable the underglow on the f: Enable or disable the underglow on the front side of the vehicle. Note not all vehicles have lights.
Enable or disable the underglow on the l: Enable or disable the underglow on the left side of the vehicle. Note not all vehicles have lights.
Enable or disable the underglow on the r: Enable or disable the underglow on the right side of the vehicle. Note not all vehicles have lights.
Enable or disable the underglow on the b: Enable or disable the underglow on the back side of the vehicle. Note not all vehicles have lights.
Select the color of the neon underglow.
Makes your vehicle not take any damage. Note, you need to go into the god menu options below to select what kind of damage you want to disable.
Enable or disable specific damage types.
Repair any visual and physical damage pr: Repair any visual and physical damage present on your vehicle.
This will constantly clean your car if t: This will constantly clean your car if the vehicle dirt level goes above 0. Note that this only cleans ~o~dust~s~ or ~o~dirt~s~. This does not clean mud, snow or other ~r~damage decals~s~. Repair your vehicle to remove them.
Select how much dirt should be visible o: Select how much dirt should be visible on your vehicle, press ~r~enter~s~ to apply the selected level.
Tune and customize your vehicle here.
Style your vehicle even further by givin: Style your vehicle even further by giving it some ~g~Snailsome ~s~colors!
Make your vehicle shine with some fancy: Make your vehicle shine with some fancy neon underglow!
Style your vehicle with fancy liveries!: Style your vehicle with fancy liveries!
Enter a custom license plate for your ve: Enter a custom license plate for your vehicle.
Choose a license plate type and press ~r: Choose a license plate type and press ~r~enter ~s~to apply it to your vehicle.
Open, close, remove and restore vehicle: Open, close, remove and restore vehicle doors here.
Roll your windows up/down or remove/rest: Roll your windows up/down or remove/restore your vehicle windows here.
Prevents you from being knocked off your: Prevents you from being knocked off your bike, bicyle, ATV or similar.
Set your vehicles max speed to your ~y~c: Set your vehicles max speed to your ~y~current speed~s~. Resetting your vehicles max speed will set the max speed of your current vehicle back to default. Only your current vehicle is affected by this option.
Enables the torque multiplier selected f: Enables the torque multiplier selected from the list below.
Enables the power multiplier selected fr: Enables the power multiplier selected from the list below.
Disables the turbulence for all planes. Note only works for planes. Helicopters and other flying vehicles are not supported.
Sets your current vehicle on all 4 wheel: Sets your current vehicle on all 4 wheels.
Cycle through the available vehicle seat: Cycle through the available vehicle seats.
Fix or destroy a specific vehicle tire,: Fix or destroy a specific vehicle tire, or all of them at once. Note, not all indexes are valid for all vehicles, some might not do anything on certain vehicles.
Makes your vehicle visible/invisible. ~r: Makes your vehicle visible/invisible. ~r~Your vehicle will be made visible again as soon as you leave the vehicle. Otherwise you would not be able to get back in.
Keeps your vehicle engine on when you ex: Keeps your vehicle engine on when you exit your vehicle.
Enables or disables infinite fuel for th: Enables or disables infinite fuel for this vehicle, only works if FRFuel is installed.
Shows the vehicle health on the screen.
Select a default radio station to be set: Select a default radio station to be set when spawning new car
Disables your vehicle's siren. Only work: Disables your vehicle's siren. Only works if your vehicle actually has a siren.
No longer auto-equip a helmet when getti: No longer auto-equip a helmet when getting on a bike or quad.
Turn on your highbeams on your vehicle w: Turn on your highbeams on your vehicle when honking your horn. Does not work during the day when you have your lights turned off.
Delete your vehicle, this ~r~can NOT be: Delete your vehicle, this ~r~can NOT be undone~s~!
There are no addon cars available in thi: There are no addon cars available in this category.
These addon vehicles are not currently b: These addon vehicles are not currently being streamed (correctly) and are not able to be spawned.
Enter the name of a vehicle to spawn.
This will teleport you into the vehicle: This will teleport you into the vehicle when you spawn it.
This will automatically delete your prev: This will automatically delete your previously spawned vehicle when you spawn a new vehicle.
A list of addon vehicles available on th: A list of addon vehicles available on this server.
Spawn a vehicle from the ~o~Sports Class: Spawn a vehicle from the ~o~Sports Classics ~s~class.
Spawn a vehicle from the ~o~Open Wheel ~: Spawn a vehicle from the ~o~Open Wheel ~s~class.
Your saved vehicle will be replaced with: Your saved vehicle will be replaced with the vehicle you are currently sitting in. ~r~Warning: this can NOT be undone!
~r~This will delete your saved vehicle. Warning: this can NOT be undone!
Save the vehicle you are currently sitti: Save the vehicle you are currently sitting in.
All saved vehicles from the Compacts cat: All saved vehicles from the Compacts category.
All saved vehicles from the Sedans categ: All saved vehicles from the Sedans category.
All saved vehicles from the SUVs categor: All saved vehicles from the SUVs category.
All saved vehicles from the Coupes categ: All saved vehicles from the Coupes category.
All saved vehicles from the Muscle categ: All saved vehicles from the Muscle category.
All saved vehicles from the Sports Class: All saved vehicles from the Sports Classics category.
All saved vehicles from the Sports categ: All saved vehicles from the Sports category.
All saved vehicles from the Super catego: All saved vehicles from the Super category.
All saved vehicles from the Motorcycles: All saved vehicles from the Motorcycles category.
All saved vehicles from the Off-Road cat: All saved vehicles from the Off-Road category.
All saved vehicles from the Industrial c: All saved vehicles from the Industrial category.
All saved vehicles from the Utility cate: All saved vehicles from the Utility category.
All saved vehicles from the Vans categor: All saved vehicles from the Vans category.
All saved vehicles from the Cycles categ: All saved vehicles from the Cycles category.
All saved vehicles from the Boats catego: All saved vehicles from the Boats category.
All saved vehicles from the Helicopters: All saved vehicles from the Helicopters category.
All saved vehicles from the Planes categ: All saved vehicles from the Planes category.
All saved vehicles from the Service cate: All saved vehicles from the Service category.
All saved vehicles from the Emergency ca: All saved vehicles from the Emergency category.
All saved vehicles from the Military cat: All saved vehicles from the Military category.
All saved vehicles from the Commercial c: All saved vehicles from the Commercial category.
All saved vehicles from the Trains categ: All saved vehicles from the Trains category.
All saved vehicles from the Open Wheel c: All saved vehicles from the Open Wheel category.
These vehicles are currently unavailable: These vehicles are currently unavailable because the models are not present in the game. These vehicles are most likely not being streamed from the server.
Sets your current vehicle as your person: Sets your current vehicle as your personal vehicle. If you already have a personal vehicle set then this will override your selection.
Toggles the engine on or off, even when: Toggles the engine on or off, even when you're not inside of the vehicle. This does not work if someone else is currently using your vehicle.
This will enable or disable your vehicle: This will enable or disable your vehicle headlights, the engine of your vehicle needs to be running for this to work.
This will remove all passengers from you: This will remove all passengers from your personal vehicle.
This will lock all your vehicle doors fo: This will lock all your vehicle doors for all players. Anyone already inside will always be able to leave the vehicle, even if the doors are locked.
This will unlock all your vehicle doors: This will unlock all your vehicle doors for all players.
Sounds the horn of the vehicle.
Toggles the vehicle alarm sound on or of: Toggles the vehicle alarm sound on or off. This does not set an alarm. It only toggles the current sounding status of the alarm.
Enables or disables the blip that gets a: Enables or disables the blip that gets added when you mark a vehicle as your personal vehicle.
If enabled, then you will be the only on: If enabled, then you will be the only one that can enter the drivers seat. Other players will not be able to drive the car. They can still be passengers.
Spawn a ped from the addon peds list.
Spawn a ped by entering it's name manual: Spawn a ped by entering it's name manually.
Select a new ped from the main player-pe: Select a new ped from the main player-peds list.
This is disabled by the server owner, pr: This is disabled by the server owner, probably for a good reason because animals quite often crash the game.
Repalce this saved ped with your current: Repalce this saved ped with your current ped. Note this can not be undone!
Delete this saved ped. Note this can not: Delete this saved ped. Note this can not be undone!
Save your current ped. Note for the MP M: Save your current ped. Note for the MP Male/Female peds this won't save most of their customization, just because that's impossible. Create those characters in the MP Character creator instead.
Edit, rename, clone, spawn or delete sav: Edit, rename, clone, spawn or delete saved peds.
Change ped model by selecting one from t: Change ped model by selecting one from the list or by selecting an addon ped from the list.
Change the walking style of your current: Change the walking style of your current ped. You need to re-apply this each time you change player model or load a saved ped.
Set the style of the animation used on y: Set the style of the animation used on your player's illuminated clothing items.
Set a facial expression that will be use: Set a facial expression that will be used whenever your ped is idling.
Are you sure? All unsaved work will be l: Are you sure? All unsaved work will be lost.
Select how much of your head shape shoul: Select how much of your head shape should be inherited from your father or mother. All the way on the left is your dad, all the way on the right is your mom.
Select how much of your body skin tone s: Select how much of your body skin tone should be inherited from your father or mother. All the way on the left is your dad, all the way on the right is your mom.
Set the Nose Width face feature value.
Set the Noes Peak Height face feature va: Set the Noes Peak Height face feature value.
Set the Nose Peak Length face feature va: Set the Nose Peak Length face feature value.
Set the Nose Bone Height face feature va: Set the Nose Bone Height face feature value.
Set the Nose Peak Lowering face feature: Set the Nose Peak Lowering face feature value.
Set the Nose Bone Twist face feature val: Set the Nose Bone Twist face feature value.
Set the Eyebrows Height face feature val: Set the Eyebrows Height face feature value.
Set the Eyebrows Depth face feature valu: Set the Eyebrows Depth face feature value.
Set the Cheekbones Height face feature v: Set the Cheekbones Height face feature value.
Set the Cheekbones Width face feature va: Set the Cheekbones Width face feature value.
Set the Cheeks Width face feature value.
Set the Eyes Opening face feature value.
Set the Lips Thickness face feature valu: Set the Lips Thickness face feature value.
Set the Jaw Bone Width face feature valu: Set the Jaw Bone Width face feature value.
Set the Jaw Bone Depth/Length face featu: Set the Jaw Bone Depth/Length face feature value.
Set the Chin Height face feature value.
Set the Chin Depth/Length face feature v: Set the Chin Depth/Length face feature value.
Set the Chin Width face feature value.
Set the Chin Hole Size face feature valu: Set the Chin Hole Size face feature value.
Set the Neck Thickness face feature valu: Set the Neck Thickness face feature value.
This allows you to edit everything about: This allows you to edit everything about your saved character. The changes will be saved to this character's save file entry once you hit the save button.
This will make a clone of your saved cha: This will make a clone of your saved character. It will ask you to provide a name for that character. If that name is already taken the action will be canceled.
If you set this character as your defaul: If you set this character as your default character, and you enable the 'Respawn As Default MP Character' option in the Misc Settings menu, then you will be set as this character whenever you (re)spawn.
You can rename this saved character. If: You can rename this saved character. If the name is already taken then the action will be canceled.
Deletes the selected saved character. Th: Deletes the selected saved character. This can not be undone!
Spawn, edit or delete your existing save: Spawn, edit or delete your existing saved multiplayer characters.
Enable or disable dynamic weather change: Enable or disable dynamic weather changes.
This disables or enables all lights acro: This disables or enables all lights across the map.
This will force snow to appear on the gr: This will force snow to appear on the ground and enable snow particle effects for peds and vehicles. Combine with X-MAS or Light Snow weather for best results.
Add random clouds to the sky!: Add random clouds to the sky!
Remove all clouds from the sky!: Remove all clouds from the sky!
Equip or remove the primary parachute: Equip or remove the primary parachute
Enables the reserve parachute. Only work: Enables the reserve parachute. Only works if you enabled the primary parachute first. Reserve parachute can not be removed from the player once it's activated.
Automatically equip a parachute and rese: Automatically equip a parachute and reserve parachute when entering planes/helicopters.
Enable unlimited parachutes and reserve: Enable unlimited parachutes and reserve parachutes.
Choose a smoke trail color, then press s: Choose a smoke trail color, then press select to change it. Changing colors takes 4 seconds, you can not use your smoke while the color is being changed.
Open the options for ~y~Pistol Mk II~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Heavy Revolver M: Open the options for ~y~Heavy Revolver Mk II~s~.
Open the options for ~y~SNS Pistol Mk II: Open the options for ~y~SNS Pistol Mk II~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Assault Rifle Mk: Open the options for ~y~Assault Rifle Mk II~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Bullpup Rifle Mk: Open the options for ~y~Bullpup Rifle Mk II~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Carbine Rifle Mk: Open the options for ~y~Carbine Rifle Mk II~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Special Carbine: Open the options for ~y~Special Carbine Mk II~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Double Barrel Sh: Open the options for ~y~Double Barrel Shotgun~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Pump Shotgun Mk: Open the options for ~y~Pump Shotgun Mk II~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Combat MG Mk II~: Open the options for ~y~Combat MG Mk II~s~.
Open the options for ~y~SMG Mk II~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Antique Cavalry: Open the options for ~y~Antique Cavalry Dagger~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Compact Grenade: Open the options for ~y~Compact Grenade Launcher~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Heavy Sniper Mk: Open the options for ~y~Heavy Sniper Mk II~s~.
Open the options for ~y~Marksman Rifle M: Open the options for ~y~Marksman Rifle Mk II~s~.
Removes all weapons in your inventory.
Set the amount of ammo in all your weapo: Set the amount of ammo in all your weapons.
Give all your weapons max ammo.
Enter a weapon mode name to spawn.
Equip / remove addon weapons available o: Equip / remove addon weapons available on this server.
All parachute related options can be cha: All parachute related options can be changed here.
Spawn this saved weapons loadout. This w: Spawn this saved weapons loadout. This will remove all your current weapons and replace them with this saved slot.
Clones this saved loadout to a new slot.
Set this loadout to be your default load: Set this loadout to be your default loadout for whenever you (re)spawn. This will override the 'Restore Weapons' option inside the Misc Settings menu. You can toggle this option in the main Weapon Loadouts menu.
~r~This replaces this saved slot with th: ~r~This replaces this saved slot with the weapons that you currently have in your inventory. This action can not be undone!
~r~This will delete this saved loadout. This action can not be undone!
Save your current weapons into a new loa: Save your current weapons into a new loadout slot.
If you've set a loadout as default loado: If you've set a loadout as default loadout, then your loadout will be equipped automatically whenever you (re)spawn.
Set the voice chat receiving proximity i: Set the voice chat receiving proximity in meters.
Shows whether your microphone is open or: Shows whether your microphone is open or muted.
Start a new game recording using GTA V's: Start a new game recording using GTA V's built in recording.
Stop and save your current recording.
Open the rockstar editor, note you might: Open the rockstar editor, note you might want to quit the session first before doing this to prevent some issues.
Teleport to the waypoint on your map.
Enter x, y, z coordinates and you will b: Enter x, y, z coordinates and you will be teleported to that location.
Teleport to pre-configured locations, ad: Teleport to pre-configured locations, added by the server owner.
Adds your current location to the telepo: Adds your current location to the teleport locations menu and saves it on the server.
Clears the area around your player (100: Clears the area around your player (100 meters). Damage, dirt, peds, props, vehicles, etc. Everything gets cleaned up, fixed and reset to the default world state.
Show your current coordinates at the top: Show your current coordinates at the top of your screen.
Draws the model outlines for every vehic: Draws the model outlines for every vehicle that's currently close to you.
Draws the model outlines for every prop: Draws the model outlines for every prop that's currently close to you.
Draws the model outlines for every ped t: Draws the model outlines for every ped that's currently close to you.
Draws the the entity handles for all clo: Draws the the entity handles for all close entities (you must enable the outline functions above for this to work).
Draws the the entity models for all clos: Draws the the entity models for all close entities (you must enable the outline functions above for this to work).
Draws the the entity net owner for all c: Draws the the entity net owner for all close entities (you must enable the outline functions above for this to work).
Select a timecycle modifier and enable t: Select a timecycle modifier and enable the checkbox above.
Enable or disable the timecycle modifier: Enable or disable the timecycle modifier from the list below.
Spawns entity into the world and lets yo: Spawns entity into the world and lets you set its position and rotation
Stops placing entity and sets it at it c: Stops placing entity and sets it at it current location.
Stops placing entity and sets it at it current location and creates new one to place.
Deletes current entity and cancels its p: Deletes current entity and cancels its placement
Teleport to your waypoint when pressing: Teleport to your waypoint when pressing the keybind. By default, this keybind is set to ~r~F7~s~, server owners are able to change this however so ask them if you don't know what it is.
Makes your vehicle have almost no tracti: Makes your vehicle have almost no traction while holding left shift on keyboard, or X on controller.
Enables or disables the recording (gamep: Enables or disables the recording (gameplay recording for the Rockstar editor) hotkeys on both keyboard and controller.
Press the Multiplayer Info (z on keyboar: Press the Multiplayer Info (z on keyboard, down arrow on controller) key to switch between expanded radar and normal radar.
Enables the finger point toggle key. The: Enables the finger point toggle key. The default QWERTY keyboard mapping for this is 'B', or for controller quickly double tap the right analog stick.
Leaves you connected to the server, but: Leaves you connected to the server, but quits the network session. ~r~Can not be used when you are the host.
This may not work in all cases, but you: This may not work in all cases, but you can try to use this if you want to re-join the previous session after clicking 'Quit Session'.
Disconnects you from the server and retu: Disconnects you from the server and returns you to the serverlist. ~r~This feature is not recommended, quit the game completely instead and restart it for a better experience.
If you want vMenu to appear on the left: If you want vMenu to appear on the left side of your screen, disable this option. This option will be saved immediately. You don't need to click save preferences.
Prevent others from sending you a privat: Prevent others from sending you a private message via the Online Players menu. This also prevents you from sending messages to other players.
This disables the controller menu toggle: This disables the controller menu toggle key. This does NOT disable the navigation buttons.
Show a speedometer on your screen indica: Show a speedometer on your screen indicating your speed in KM/h.
Show a speedometer on your screen indicating your speed in MPH.
Enable or disable keybinds for some opti: Enable or disable keybinds for some options.
Shows your current location and heading,: Shows your current location and heading, as well as the nearest cross road. Similar like PLD. ~r~Warning: This feature (can) take(s) up to -4.6 FPS when running at 60 Hz.
Shows you the current time on screen.
Receive notifications when someone joins: Receive notifications when someone joins or leaves the server.
Receive notifications when someone dies: Receive notifications when someone dies or gets killed.
Shows blips on the map for some common l: Shows blips on the map for some common locations.
Shows blips on the map for all players. ~y~Note for when the server is using OneSync Infinity: this won't work for players that are too far away.
Enables or disables player overhead name: Enables or disables player overhead names.
If you enable this, then you will (re)sp: If you enable this, then you will (re)spawn as your default saved MP character. Note the server owner can globally disable this option. To set your default character, go to one of your saved MP Characters and click the 'Set As Default Character' button.
Restore your player's skin whenever you: Restore your player's skin whenever you respawn after being dead. Re-joining a server will not restore your previous skin.
Restore your weapons whenever you respaw: Restore your weapons whenever you respawn after being dead. Re-joining a server will not restore your previous weapons.
Locks your camera horizontal rotation. C: Locks your camera horizontal rotation. Could be useful in helicopters I guess.
Locks your camera vertical rotation. Cou: Locks your camera vertical rotation. Could be useful in helicopters I guess.
Save your current settings. All saving i: Save your current settings. All saving is done on the client side, if you re-install windows you will lose your settings. Settings are shared across all servers using vMenu.
